name: Jellyfin Ratings
overview: Adds MDbList ratings from multiple sources (IMDB, TMDb, Trakt, Letterboxd, etc.) to your Jellyfin interface.
description: Adds MDbList ratings from multiple sources (IMDB, TMDb, Trakt, Letterboxd, etc.) to your Jellyfin interface.

name: Jellyfin Ratings (Stable Build)
overview: Adds MDbList ratings from multiple sources (IMDB, TMDb, Trakt, Letterboxd, etc.) to your Jellyfin interface.
description: Fixes the icon URL, switches to a secure NuGet feed, and stabilizes the build process.

name: Jellyfin Ratings (Version Sync)
overview: Adds MDbList ratings from multiple sources (IMDB, TMDb, Trakt, Letterboxd, etc.) to your Jellyfin interface.
description: Final fix: Update dependencies and target framework to .NET 9.0 for full 10.11.x compatibility.
